inclusion.criterion: Belongs to one of the following categories: A. Acute decompensated left HF
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Dyspnea at rest or with minimal activity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of pulmonary congestion or edema on chest X-ray.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Compensated left HF: patients with significant stable left HF (NYHA II-III)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Non-CHF controls: patients without CHF and without uncontrolled hypertension
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated left HF subgroup & Non CHF controls
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has acute decompensated left HF with pulmonary congestion and edema on chest X-ray, meets criteria for category A. However, patient also belongs to the exclusion criterion of Decompensated left HF subgroup & Non CHF controls.
